biotools.summary:
Accurate reconstruction of bacterial pan- and core genomes with PEPPAN.
PEPPAN (Phylogeny Enhanced Pipeline for PAN-genome) is a pipeline that can construct a pan-genome from thousands of genetically diversified bacterial genomes. PEPPAN implements a combination of tree- and synteny-based approaches to identify and exclude paralogous genes, as well as similarity-based gene predictions that support consistent annotations of genes and pseudogenes in individual genomes.

There are two final output files for PEPPAN:.

This file includes all pan-genes predicted by PEPPAN in GFF3 format. Intact CDSs are labeled as "CDS", disrupted genes (potential pseudogenes) are labeled as "pseudogene" and suspicious annotations ignored in the pipeline are labeled as "misc_feature" entries.

bioschemas.name: PEPPAN
bioschemas.summary:
Accurate reconstruction of bacterial pan- and core genomes with PEPPAN.
PEPPAN (Phylogeny Enhanced Pipeline for PAN-genome) is a pipeline that can construct a pan-genome from thousands of genetically diversified bacterial genomes. PEPPAN implements a combination of tree- and synteny-based approaches to identify and exclude paralogous genes, as well as similarity-based gene predictions that support consistent annotations of genes and pseudogenes in individual genomes.

There are two final output files for PEPPAN:.

This file includes all pan-genes predicted by PEPPAN in GFF3 format. Intact CDSs are labeled as "CDS", disrupted genes (potential pseudogenes) are labeled as "pseudogene" and suspicious annotations ignored in the pipeline are labeled as "misc_feature" entries.
